comment.body:
If I want update cloned blog I must:
- Copy and overwrite every file and directory from data/1BLogC9LN... to data/mysiteaddress except "data" directory and "content.json"
- Sign + Publish my blog using the sidebar

How about cloned forum?

How on this new Windows exe version Zeronet use command like:
```"../Python/python" zeronet.py siteSign``` if there is no python folder?

> [nofish](#comment_175_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have to go to the lib directory, then ZeroNet.cmd siteSign yoursiteaddress or you can use the sidebar at your site (drag the top-right 0 button to left)

Thanks! So if I pull out sidebar and from Content publishing choose content.json and then click on Sign and then on Publish, this is the same as if i do command ```ZeroNet.cmd siteSign yoursiteaddress```? Thats great, thanks!
